characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A Renegade Knight can Fall Back in the Movement phase and still shoot and/or charge during its turn. It can even move over enemy INFANTRY UNITS, thought at the end of its turn it must be more than 1" from all enemy units. In addition, a Renegage Knight can move and fire Heavy weapons without suffering the penalty to its hit rolls. Finally, a Renegade Knight only gains a bonus to its save in cover if at least half the model is obscured from the firer.
